title.value: Комплексный адсорбент 'Ньютокс' в кормлении молодняка свиней
Complex adsorbent 'Nytoks' in feeding of young growth of pigs
Complex adsorbent 'Nytoks' in feeding of young growth of pigs

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Kovalevskij, V.F., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In 2011 in SPK 'Teterevka' of the Berestovitskij district of the Republic of Belarus there were carried out researches for determination of zootechnical and economic efficiency factors of use of a complex system of linkage of micotoxins 'Nytoks' as a part of mixed fodders for a young growth of pigs and fattening. It is proved, that the studied additive promotes increase of daily average accretions of alive mass of animals on 9,2% and to decrease in expenses of mixed fodder on 1 kg of a gain of alive mass on 8,4%. Besides, the drug 'Nytoks' positively influences on: morphological and biochemical and resistance the status of an organism of pigs, level of protein metabolism and a dressing percentage, an index meat content, and also a ratio in the hulk of meat, grease ice, bones. Drug injection in mixed fodders raises profitability of fattening of pigs on 7,8%, thus the economic return production compounds - 8,3 times.
